content: But that's okay! The journey matters more than the outcome. I mean to say, I had fun going to the Islet with you.
info: 萨飞里-个人任务4结束_萨飞里

content: From what I've observed, the dragonblood tree we cut down last time was of the same species I used as a trail marker back in the day.
info: 萨飞里-个人任务4结束_萨飞里

content: {A笑眯眯}It's a pity that the tree's age doesn't match up, and I couldn't find the markings I made.
info: 萨飞里-个人任务4结束_萨飞里
